title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that the percent employed in agriculture declined in both sub-Saharan Africa and the world during this time period.

Two points for comparing the rate or level of the decline in employment in agriculture in both sub-Saharan Africa and the world during this time period.
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain one of the following comparisons of the trend lines:
The response correctly states the following comparison of the trend lines:
The response correctly explains one of the following comparisons of the trend lines:

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that economic pull factors in urban areas contributed to a decline in agricultural employment in South Asia.

Two points for explaining the relationship between one or more specific economic pull factors and the decline in agricultural employment.
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain one of the following degrees to which economic pull factors have affected agricultural employment:
The response correctly states the following degree to which economic pull factors have affected agricultural employment:
The response correctly explains one of the following degrees to which economic pull factors have affected agricultural employment:

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that the graph does not provide any direct information about the use of genetically modified organisms in the regions shown on the graph.

Two points for explaining that the graph does not provide any direct information about the processes or spatial relationships that led to declines in employment in agriculture.
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain one of the following limitations of the data to explain the impacts of using genetically modified organisms on the agricultural percentage of the workforce:
The response correctly states the following limitation of the data to explain the impacts of using genetically modified organisms on the agricultural percentage of the workforce:
The response correctly explains one of the following limitations of the data to explain the impacts of using genetically modified organisms on the agricultural percentage of the workforce:

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that in sub-Saharan Africa/South Asia/East Asia and Pacific/Latin American and Caribbean, a decline in employment in agriculture may lead to a decrease in food security.

Two points for explaining the relationship between declining employment in agriculture and increasing or decreasing challenges to food security.
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain how one of the following changes in the percent of the workforce engaged in agriculture will affect the challenges to food security:
The response correctly states how the following change in the percent of the workforce engaged in agriculture will affect the challenges to food security:
The response correctly explains how one of the following changes in the percent of the workforce engaged in agriculture will affect the challenges to food security:
